text:
Hi,

Need some suggestion for a custom blog post theme. I would appreciate if someone can guide me to the right direction: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Blog-Post-Optimisation-Suggestion/m-p/894249#M37144>

Has anyone ever had issues with the “quote_signature” module when running other JS on a quote? I’m having a tricky issue during testing where sometimes when clicking the “Verify” button a POST request is made, and other times there is no POST request made and the button is inactive. TIA!!

Here’s a screen recording of the issue: <https://share.descript.com/view/h5kpsjUYsnv>
